description: Unique identifier for this status change record.
Timestamp when the change event was recorded in the system.
User or process that initiated the status change (e.g., automated system).
Internal ID of the asset whose status changed; references the asset master.
Snapshot of the asset’s business identifier at the time of change; likely denormalized for history; confirm with SME.
Snapshot of the asset’s description or name captured when the change occurred; confirm with SME.
Code representing the resulting status after the change; maps to a status lookup.
Snapshot of the resulting status code at change time for historical reporting; confirm with SME.
Text description of the resulting status captured at change time; confirm with SME.
Code for the prior status before the change; maps to a status lookup.
Snapshot of the prior status code at change time for historical reporting; confirm with SME.
Text description of the prior status captured at change time; confirm with SME.
System-generated timestamp for the most recent update to this record.
Effective date and time the asset’s status actually changed.
Timestamp when a user last modified this record (distinct from automated updates); confirm with SME.
User or process that created this record.
Timestamp when this record was created.
User or process that last updated this record.
Timestamp when this record was last updated.
